summary: Music and Commercials companion for SkyRadio!
descriptionHtml:
Name: SkyRadio Muzak Pack!
Version: Extra Awesome
Date: 5/13/2013
Recommended: Nexus Mod Manager
Author(s): SoberBarn

Description
===========
Have you wanted to try out the well made SkyRadio mod, but were like me and didn\'t really want to listen to Metallica or The Jonas Brothers or Skrillex or Linkin Park or whatever these kids listen to these days? But I digress...

This is a music collection all used and presented here under the Creative Commons Licence. Along with the music are several commercials for various businesses around Skyrim, a DJ-esque sort of character and three book readings. All voiced segments are voiced by me.

Install
=======
Extract Data folder to you main Skyrim install directory.

-or-

Use NMM

Uninstall
=========
Why? (;_;)

Fine.

Just delete all the items out of your Data/Music/SkyRadio folder.

Then feel bad.


Incompatibility
===============
This \"mod\" will be incompatible with anyone who doesn\'t have SkyRadio.


History
=======

May 5, 2013 - Made the \"Mod.\" 

Contact
=======
Don\'t call us, we\'ll call you.

If you feel you must you can contact me here on the Nexus. Especially if you\'re willing to contribute some voice acting for a commercial.

Credits
=======
Thanks to the artists providing their music under the Creative Commons Licence:

Thanks to www.jsayles.com for providing the lovely music pieces for free and asking nothin in return.
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Oblivion (and Skyrim}.
Thanks to the Nexus for the a one-stop-shop resource for authors and players.
Thanks to LHammonds for the {outdated} Readme Generator this file was based on.
Thanks to God for creating us all.

Licensing/Legal
===============
You may not use my voice in the commercials to do anything with. This includes making embarrassing soundboards for use in silly prank call videos on YouTube.
author: SoberBarn
